ENTERTAINMENT & EVENTS

From star-studded nights to fashion shows, Phoenixx, Goa is power packed with entertainment and fun, you will never leave a night disappointed!

Live Music Performances

Experience electrifying performances by top artists and bands in an intimate setting.

Fashion Shows

Witness glamorous runway events featuring top designers and models in our luxurious venue.

DJ Nights

Dance the night away with our resident and guest DJs spinning the latest hits.
